programme.title: President Clinton's first week in office
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton's encounter with the military in his first week in office.
programme.medium_synopsis: Clinton's first week in office is marred by abandoned campaign promises, a bruising encounter with the military and a failed attempt to make Mrs Baird Attorney General.
